LanguageData.MustPlaceForStonySoil: Must be placed on stone, sand, or packed dirt terrain.
LanguageData.MustPlaceForSoil: Must be placed on stony soil terrain.
LanguageData.MustPlaceForRichSoil: Must be placed on soil or lichen-covered soil terrain.
LanguageData.MustPlaceForLichenCoveredSoil: Must be placed on fungal gravel terrain.
